General.Name: Healthcare Co Ltd
General.Description: Healthcare Co.,Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells memory foam mattresses, pillows, sofas, and other household products in China. It offers adjustable bases, mattress protectors, and electric beds, as well as kids product. The company sells its products under the MLILY brand through company-owned retail shops. It also exports its products to North America, Europe, Asia, Australia, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Nantong Hengkang Sponge Products Co., Ltd. Healthcare Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Rugao, China.
